data.message: Can he help me get access to my account....because nobody else at Facebook seems to be able to.  I've reported this several times in the past week.  Facebook keeps crashing when I try to login to my account (using another one obviously).  Is there any way I can speak to a tech support rep?  I have not gotten a response/resolution from reporting this for a week.

replies.message: Hi Teresa. We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your report. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard: http://on.fb.me/1t8uQ4d -Leigh
I have the same problem.I tried everything im could and no result I gave report a problem no one contacted me is there any chance that the account gets back ?
If it happens on just one machine then Uninstall and then reinstall. If it happens on multiple machines then it's something on Facebook side
It's on multiple computers. Definitely a FB issue
Could you guys please respond to me to address the issue I'm having? I can't find customer service, contact us, etc.
